items.title: US economy grows at fastest pace in two years
items.description: Strong consumer spending helps the US economy grow at a faster rate than expected.

items.title: Husband in court charged with drugging and repeatedly raping ex-wife
items.description: Ex-councillor Philip Young is one of six men accused of more than 60 offences against Joanne Young.

items.title: Three killed after Russia launches 'massive' attack across Ukraine
items.description: Several regions are without power after missile and drone strikes targeted several cities.

items.title: Men guilty of gun attack plot targeting Manchester's Jewish community
items.description: Greater Manchester Police say the plot could have been "the deadliest terrorist attack in UK history".

items.title: 'Come on Pep!' - Dyche's response to Guardiola's weight demands
items.description: Sean Dyche has told his Nottingham Forest players to "enjoy themselves" but "use common sense" over Christmas, after Pep Guardiola said Man City's pla...
